definitions.text: a category of things distinguished by some common characteristic or quality
examples: sculpture is a form of art
what kinds of desserts are there?
she wore a sort of magenta dress
she served a creamy sort of dessert thing

definitions.text: a person of a particular character or nature
examples: what sort of person is he?

definitions.text: an operation that segregates items into groups according to a specified criterion
examples: the bottleneck in mail delivery is the process of sorting

definitions.text: examine in order to test suitability
arrange or order by classes or categories
examples: How would you classify these pottery shards--are they prehistoric?
